Publish.LongDescription:
# Mio Policy Asset Pack Added more city policy options.
### Warning: Assets are **highly experimental**. Please back up your save file before use. Known issues include: - Subscribing to assets **without the complete loading of assets** (not restarted twice) may lead to errors. - If your **mods fail to load successfully** while subscribing to assets, it may result in errors.
## Policys - Restrict Exports - Restrict Imports - Overloaded Industrial Production - Digitalization Initiative - Accept Refugees
## Localization - en-US - 简体中文
## Acknowledgment Special thanks to Konsi for the asset loading framework.
## More If you want to create a similar asset pack, please use this template: https://github.com/kosch104/CS2-CustomAssetPack
